id: T1 Silver Birch - Reduce in height and spread by approximatley 2m (back to previous pruning points).

T469 Common Ash, T481 Hornbeam, T612 Beech, : Monolith to a height of 5m. T348 Common Lime : Crown reduce to the northeast to give 2m clearance of building. T302 Silver Birch, T99 Rowan, T471 Sycamore, T73 Copper Beech, T606 Rowan: Fell to ground level. G252 (a) Beech : Prune to give 2m clearance from building. G252 (b) Ash, T235 Silver Birch : Monolith to leave habitat stem. T64 Common Beech : Reduce western co-dominant stem by 3m, to reduce weight on union. T62 Common Beech: Reduce limbs over the road to the west by 3m. T500 Beech: Reduce large limb over the boardwalk by approximately 5m to relieve weight and reduce likelihood of branch failure.
